mapper.sql: dmCondition.id as dmCondition_id, dmCondition.user_name as dmCondition_user_name, dmCondition.access_address as dmCondition_access_address, dmCondition.ip_country as dmCondition_ip_country, dmCondition.time_zone as dmCondition_time_zone, dmCondition.time_continent as dmCondition_time_continent, dmCondition.is_chinese as dmCondition_is_chinese, dmCondition.is_mobile as dmCondition_is_mobile, dmCondition.is_specific_device as dmCondition_is_specific_device, dmCondition.is_fbclid as dmCondition_is_fbclid, dmCondition.create_time as dmCondition_create_time, dmCondition.update_time as dmCondition_update_time
